title: The Unification of Paikmeriz: An Epic Fantasy Novel (A Reign of Darkness Book 1)
features: A fragile peace. Old hatreds and a hunger for power. When an ancient enemy resurfaces, can a troubled warrior prevent evil from consuming the land?

Revenge burns deep within Engerahin Lovdiena. After witnessing the death of his childhood friend and the imprisonment of his father, only retribution can temper his tortured soul. And refusing to let anything stand in his way, he plots to repay the despotic king.A cryptic message of growing unrest tempts his blade, but the Elven king entrusts Engerahin with a crucial responsibility he cannot ignore. Only he can protect the princess, who may be the key to uniting the six kingdoms. But can he adhere to his duty, or will his actions thrust the land into war?The Unification of Paikmeriz is the gripping first book in the sweeping epic fantasy series A Reign of Darkness. If you like conflicted heroes, intricate puzzles, and rich world-building, then you’ll adore Bryan Caimi’s tale.Buy The Unification of Paikmeriz to preserve the realm today!
